attributes.action: Increase the income threshold for WTC to help those single, low earners who will lose out when the 10% tax band is scrapped
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current income threshold for WTC to a single person seems to be around £11700pa.  Increase this limit substantially so that single, low earning people, who will pay more tax when the 10% tax band is scrapped, will not be worse off.  Such people are effectively subsidising those with much higher incomes.
